title: Trump Squeezed America's Geek Squad. Biden Built It Back Stronger
description: The US Digital Service has seen its staff and budget expand under president Biden. Director Mina Hsiang says online government services should be made as compelling as apps from Silicon Valley.

title: Big Batteries Are Booming. So Are Fears They'll Catch Fire
description: The world needs thousands of new grid battery installations to fight climate change. They rarely catch fire—but many people are skeptical of having one next door.
